release_notes:
• Implement real-time Firestore listeners for automatic sync
• Add comprehensive calculation documentation and tests
• Add PWA icons for web
• Improve web UX and sync debugging
• Fix web: skip local database and use Firestore directly
• Fix connectivity check with dynamic typing for dart2js
• Fix connectivity check to handle platform differences
• Fix connectivity check for connectivity_plus v5+
• Add web database support and responsive layout
• Use correct OAuth client ID from acorn-capital project
